result.arabic_text: قُل لَّوۡ كَانَ ٱلۡبَحۡرُ مِدَادٗا لِّكَلِمَٰتِ رَبِّي لَنَفِدَ ٱلۡبَحۡرُ قَبۡلَ أَن تَنفَدَ كَلِمَٰتُ رَبِّي وَلَوۡ جِئۡنَا بِمِثۡلِهِۦ مَدَدٗا
result.translation: 109. Nabiyow addunyâ badittc inkili midad (Quur kinnuk) akkinnay woo midaadat yi-Rabbih qangor kaat ankuttubinnay bad amarraquk yen, yi-Rabbih qangor yamurruqek duma, kay ossintinah aka badittek kay innah tanim midaadak bahnaamah yi-Rabbih yab mayamurruqaay idya mali keenik ixxic.
